definition: To rotate or turn an object or oneself around an axis or point, often with the intention of changing its position or orientation. This term is commonly employed when referring to the act of twisting, spinning, or pivoting an item or oneself in a circular motion. It can be used in various contexts, such as describing the action of turning a key, rotating a wheel, or twisting a knob.

examples.german: Ich drehe den Schlüssel im Schloss.
examples.english: I turn the key in the lock.
The wind turns the windmill blades.

examples.german: Er dreht den Hahn auf und das Wasser fließt.
examples.english: He turns on the tap and the water flows.

examples.german: Sie dreht den Knopf nach rechts.
examples.english: She turns the knob to the right.

examples.german: Der Film dreht sich um ein mysteriöses Verbrechen.
examples.english: The movie revolves around a mysterious crime.
